description:
Salary: $90,000 - $110,000 annually

Position: Nurse Supervisor

Are you a proactive and independent nursing professional with a passion for leadership and growth? We're looking for a dedicated Nurse Supervisor to join our team and play a key role in shaping our company's culture and foundation. In this role, you will have the opportunity to make a significant impact by building and expanding referral networks, developing effective marketing strategies, and overseeing clinical care to ensure exceptional service delivery.

Key Responsibilities

Foster and maintain strong relationships with community referral sources to enhance brand awareness and establish a positive reputation.

Ensure the satisfaction of referral sources to build lasting, long-term partnerships.

Represent the company at networking events, community groups, and other relevant gatherings.

Respond to inquiries from prospective clients, providing detailed information and scheduling assessments or service start dates.

Conduct comprehensive nursing assessments with prospective clients to create personalized Care Plans.

Coordinate with physicians, case managers, discharge planners, pharmacies, DME vendors, and other multidisciplinary teams to ensure clients receive the highest quality of care and services.

Communicate effectively with team members to ensure optimal alignment between client needs and provider capabilities.

Oversee and manage client care, including regular reassessments, supervision of clinical services, and support and education for assigned clinicians.

If you're enthusiastic about making a difference and growing with a supportive team, we'd love to hear from you!

Employment Type: Full-Time
